title: Foundations of Educational Technology Usability Evaluation: Online Tool Analysis for Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A science education technology evaluation process conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three usability evaluation criteria for educational technology tools.
Learners can analyze trends in usability research for science learning tools through literature reviews.
Learners can conduct usability evaluations of educational technology using online survey tools.
Learners can analyze the impact of technological environment constraints on usability evaluations through case studies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
